hero.title: Welcome to my
hero.description: Developing Solutions with AI technologies (LangChain, Flowise, CrewAI, Vector DBs), Web (React/Next.js, Headless CMS), DataScience/Python to boost your business.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: A summary of the technologies I work with.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: Knowledge in building LLM architectures. Configuration of LLMs running locally with Ollama. Building and refining prompts. Creating Agents with the main market frameworks such as: langchain, crewAI and flowise. Building automated coding workflows with Claude-CLi, Gemini-Cli and Github Copilot with SpecDriven and BMAD techniques.

lowcode.title: Low-Code/No-Code
lowcode.description: Experience in developing applications on the PowerApps platform and automation flows with PowerAutomate.

datascience.title: Data Science
datascience.description: Data exploration with Python, Pandas, Matlib, Jupyter-Notebook. Web scraping with BeautifulSOAP.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Development with React and Next.js framework and libraries like MaterialUI

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.description: Certifications: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2021 Certified Cloud Operations Associate and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Foundations 2021 Certified Associate

sql.title: Relational Databases
sql.description: Experience with SQLServer, Oracle and MySQL databases

nosql.title: NoSQL Databases
nosql.description: Knowledge of MongoDB and Cassandra databases

tools.title: Development Tools
tools.description: Version control and project management with GIT and Github. Visual Studio Code.

linux.title: Linux Operating System
linux.description: Experience using and administering Linux environments.

devops.title: DevOps
devops.description: Knowledge in using containers with Docker for system deployment.

backend.title: BackEnd
backend.description: Knowledge in building server-side applications with Node.js/Express. Creating REST APIs.

timeline.title: About Me
timeline.about: Technology professional working in the market since 1996. Currently I manage the dynamic development unit of the Court of Justice of Cear√°, where we apply low-code/no-code technologies combined with business process automation tools. Knowledge in developing Web/Mobile applications with React/Next.js and Tailwind. Using backend with Headless CMS or developed with Node.js/Express. Applying SEO techniques to ensure the client's brand is always highlighted in search results. Knowledge in Cloud platforms and how they can help companies reduce costs in operating their systems, as well as using data exploration services.
